Detailed Description

Read access for the SimInputVector class.

Author:
Lee Netherton
The SimInputVectorReadAccess class provides virtual overloaded functions for the readElement() member of MatrixReadAccess. This is needed as Simulink input vectors are stored as double** rather than double*. The extra indirection is provided with these functions.
